rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space with ample lighting and a north-facing entrance as per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Living Room / Dining Area
rooms.description: Dual-purpose space designed in Art Deco style with intricate geometric patterns and bold color accents.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with Art Deco design elements, ample storage and cooking space.

rooms.name: Bathroom 1 (Guest)
rooms.description: Functional bathroom for guests, incorporating natural materials and Vastu-aligned positioning.

rooms.name: Guest Room 1
rooms.description: A comfortable guest room designed with Art Deco style, using warm tones and vintage furniture.

openings.name: North-facing Main Entrance
openings.description: Primary entrance facing north, ensuring a positive flow of energy.

openings.name: Garage Access Door
openings.description: Door connecting to the two-car garage. Built with reinforced materials.
openings.location: West side near ground floor entry

additional_notes: Vastu considerations: The north-facing entrance is aligned for positive energy flow, and rooms are arranged accordingly. Windows and openings are designed to allow natural light while ensuring privacy.
Art Deco elements have been incorporated in interior finishes with geometric patterns, bold lines, and vintage color palettes.
